      • install

        void install​(ProductInformation product)
        User has requested to install the product

        This is done on UI thread by default, so if operation may be long running, implementations should off load to another thread

        Parameters:
        product - the product information used to determine how to install.

      • uninstall

        void uninstall​(ProductInformation product)
        User has requested to uninstall the product

        This is done on UI thread by default, so if operation may be long running, implementations should off load to another thread

        Parameters:
        product - the product information to use for uninstalling

        Check if the repo is hosted remotely (not on this device)
